stories.headline: Vikings shopping list
stories.bodyText:
With Jordan Addison suspended three games, Rondale Moore out for the season, and Jalen Nailor week-to-week, Minnesota is exploring veteran WR trades to stabilize the position.

Minnesota has already lost three of its top five receivers before Week 1, leaving Justin Jefferson as the lone established starter.

stories.headline: Nine times...
stories.bodyText:
The Yankees hit nine home runs vs. the Rays, matching their nine-homer explosion back in March against the Brewers, making them the first team in MLB history with two nine-homer games in one season.

Only four teams in MLB history have ever hit nine or more homers in a game ‚Äî the record is 10 by the 1987 Blue Jays.

stories.headline: Bad Blood
stories.bodyText:
New York and Minnesota split their 2025 regular-season series 3‚Äì1 in favor of the Lynx, after the Liberty beat them in the 2024 Finals to win their first title.

Ionescu buried a clutch 3-pointer with seconds left in last night's game, recalling her Game 3 dagger in the 2024 Finals. After the shot, Ionescu smiled and said ‚ÄúNight, night,‚Äù sending the home crowd into a frenzy.

stories.headline: Wait, what? The Jays are first?
stories.bodyText:
Scherzer went six innings, allowing just one run on four hits, and has now thrown at least six innings in five straight starts.

Scherzer is 4‚Äì2 with Toronto this season, part of the reason the Jays sit atop the AL East.

stories.headline: An arsenal of talent
stories.bodyText:
U21 players can save clubs millions in transfer fees by stepping straight into senior squads, improving performance while boosting homegrown quotas.

Arsenal‚Äôs Hale End academy has produced talents like Bukayo Saka, Emile Smith Rowe, and now Max Dowman ‚Äî all crucial as ‚Äúfree‚Äù stars from the club‚Äôs system.

stories.headline: The wait is OVER
stories.bodyText:
The Wildcats and Cyclones will meet Aug. 23 in Dublin, a neutral-site showcase. They are the only Power 5 teams squaring off in Week 0, with both offenses poised to exploit the other‚Äôs defensive weaknesses.

The rivalry has been played annually since 1917 ‚Äî this will be its first international edition.
